tool.name: OGS: AssignRasterDataToMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'AssignRasterDataToMesh'.
tool.command: AssignRasterDataToMesh --nodata '$nodata' $cell_array $node_array #if str($scalar_name): --scalar-name '$scalar_name' #end if #for $f in $raster: --raster '$f' #end for #for $f in $input: --input '$f' #end for --output output_1.vtu

param.name: nodata
param.label: nodata
param.help: The no data value used for missing values,

param.name: cell_array
param.label: cell array
param.help: Assigns raster data to cell array

param.name: node_array
param.label: node array
param.help: Assigns raster data to node array (default)

param.name: scalar_name
param.label: scalar name
param.help: The name of the newly created scalar array.

param.name: raster
param.label: raster
param.help: Input (.asc). Name of the input raster file

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: Input (.vtu). Name of the input mesh file

tool.help: This tool runs the **AssignRasterDataToMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
